attributes.action: Look closer at the entry clearance officers in outpost High Commissions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the pm to do a proper investigation into outposts as the some of the people in these positions are refusing entry clearance to spouses for reasons that arent even lawful. This is costing the taxpayers millions of pounds as appeals are often granted and tearing families apart for no reason
